name: Blocky Tower
description:
Target of this game is to stack tetris-like blocks as long as you can. 
Game ends if one of blocks fall down. No more rules.

# Controls

  • left / right arrow - move block
  • down arrow - speed up
  • up arrow / space - rotate block

# Credits

Sprites and fonts by Kenney
Music: https://freesound.org/people/ShortRecord/sounds/584430/
